message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 354996.05. 

This line item represents the change in taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid during the period. Since the value is positive (354996.05), it indicates an increase in tax payable, which means more taxes have been accrued than paid during this period.

Therefore, the value representing the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid is 354996.05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '354996.05'}}
```
